Title: Silverlight-ASP.NET connected web parts
Description: Project that shows how you can use the HTML bridge in Silverlight to postback data to a web part connection provider to update other web parts.
HomeWiki:
This is a project to provide a rough example of how to create a Silverlight web part that can update connected web parts by using the HTML bridge javascript calls.

There are other ways of accomplishing this without using connected web parts, in fact Silverlight can directly communicate between different Silverlight components on the same page (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd833063(VS.95).aspx). This project is for updating the provider part to retain compatibility with older consumers.
